summary: Adds a more practical dungeon like player home.
descriptionHtml:
Please Endorse and/or comment!! I want to know what you guys think!!! thanks!


This is a dungeon like player home located beneath a beautiful waterfall. It has many display cases and mannequins, a smithy, and enchanting and alchemy room, a bedroom, and a combat/ torture room. The home is only slightly cluttered and there are several bookshelves however I am new at modding and could not for the life of me get the bookshelves to work properly, if you know how feel free to fix it and I would be glad to reupload the fixed version. For now to put things on a bookshelf you will have to do it manually :P In order to get the house/ dungeon you will need to defeat the Dragon Priest with the key waiting outside, so this is not for low level characters.

======================Releases=============================
1.0beta
  Release, still may be bugs.
1.1beta
  Fixed a backwards chest, added a real Dragon Priest Mask altar.
author: Proxysoul
